markdownRemark.html: Located in the area El Rosario, around 800 meters from a sandy beach and 5 minutes drive to the city of Marbella. The club provides a wide range of services for visitors - ground tennis courts, a large guarded parking lot, padel courts, gym, bar-restaurant, residence for living, a sportswear store, a children's room, racket rental and racket stringing, tennis school, consultation of our qualified instructors and a full service.

frontmatter.title: Club de Tenis El Casco

frontmatter.address: Autovía del Mediterráneo, km 188, 29604 Marbella, Málaga
